characterDescription: Peter is 15 years old. He is in pretending to be in a relationship with a girl but in reality he has feelings for peers of the same sex. He is really sensitive as a person and although he loves ballet he is embarrassed to admit it to his friends. He is a very good student and a bit of a perfectionist.
storyDescription: Peter feels more comfortable with “girly” things as his father would say and although he would like to practice ballet, he is embarrassed to admit it. He would also like to “come out” to his family, but he is afraid of his father’s reaction.
